channel.title: Portfolio Management on Vuong V. Trinh
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolio Management on Vuong V. Trinh

item.title: Deep Reinforcement Learning for Portfolio Management
item.description: Table of Contents Problem Formulation Key Assumptions and Goal MDP formulation State and Action State Transition Reward Datasets Methods Data Preprocessing Numerical Data News Data Predictor Network Policy Network Optimal Action and Imitation Learning Deep Deterministic Policy Gradient (DDPG) Results Imitation Learning DDPG Imitation Learning vs DDPG Testing on Unseen Stocks Related Work Future Work Pretrained Network Problem Formulation In this project, we would like to manage portfolio by distributing our investment into a number of stocks based on the market.
